name: Robots Invasion
description:
This is a simple robot shooter within my training course on the game development. 

LEFT CTRL for shooting

ARROW UP for flying

SPACE for pause

ESC for entering to the menu

If you get Javascript error on loading, try another browser (tested in Firefox and Chrome, Edge  runs it too but with huge lags).

Assets used in this game: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/robot-shooting-game-sprite...
